0: The room was very nice I believe recently renovated with plenty of room for both working and relaxation
The whole place needs a big makeover
Clean updated great location and if you are lucky enough a great view
The location is good and the hotel has potential if the staff were better trained and the housekeeping was overhauled
Recently updated with a very cool modern decor
The Hyat has always been a nice hotel but this facility appears to have been renovated since my last stay here
Room was new and refurbished beds comfy location ify hotel and the common areas look very basic and nothing luxurious there were a lot of people staying and lifts took a long time
The hotel part is nice with visually interesting lobby areas and seems to be updated and well kept
The rooms are clean updated bathrooms and the bed was clean and comfortable
1: The hotel needs a complete remodel with quality craftsmanship not the cheapest job
if there is anything to point out it would be the pool facilities could use some updating other than that service was very strong
Also our room had the ceiling tile in the bathroom moved over as if they had just done repairs and there was a dirty ring in the toilet as if it had n’t been cleaned at all
The property itself was quite loud and was in need of an update
Hotel was in need of renovations and several things were not in working order including their hot tub
I had requested no feather bedding a higher floor and an updated room if that was a option
Their pool was down for maintenance so they allowed us to use the pool at Conrad
